content: Iâ€™m debating: Should we make a #t-compiler/debuginfo stream? The idea would be a place to have focused discussions of both the DWARF we emit from rustc, but also about alternative debuginfo formats (such as CTF)
-1 from me. debug info is not a topic that receives sufficiently high traffic that it would warrant its own subcommunity.
(I'm already having trouble keeping up with all the channels, because zulip grays them out quite aggressively)
